title: Get 1TB of cloud storage, just $120 for life
description: Koofr lifetime cloud storage plan gives you 1TB of space, accessible from any device. Pay just $119.97 for the cheapest cloud storage around. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Koofr lifetime cloud storage plan gives you 1TB of space, accessible from any device. Pay just $119.97 for the cheapest cloud storage around.
text: Deals Grab this 1TB cloud storage deal that nobody else can beat. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals It’s annoying getting notifications that you’re almost out of storage on your phone or computer. But you can quit playing that ridiculous game with one of the cheapest cloud storage deals around. With this lifetime Koofr plan, you can free up space on your iPhone, Mac or iPad with cloud storage accessible from an unlimited number of devices. Koofr offers this discounted 1TB cloud storage plan with a lifetime subscription you can’t beat. For a limited time, you can get a lifetime subscription to Koofr cloud storage for just $119.97 with code KOOFR. Koofr lifetime deal lands you 1TB of secure storage If you’re trusting your files to the cloud, you need to know the service you’re using has got your back. Koofr does not track your activity, and all your files are encrypted while at rest and in transfer. That means your files are protected when stored, downloaded and uploaded. Of course, you can still access your files whenever you want, as long as you have an internet connection. Simply log into Koofr from the desktop app or iOS app. (You can also connect external cloud accounts like Dropbox, Google Drive, Amazon and OneDrive to Koofr to access all your files.) Plus, it’s cheaper than shelling out for iCloud’s monthly fees. It’s one of the cheapest deals on cloud storage currently available. Advanced features and one of the cheapest cloud storage deals you’ll find Users give Koofr 4.8 out of 5 stars in the Cult of Mac Deals store. One verified buyer writes, “It’s minimal, the search is fast and features like duplicate detection just don’t exist on Box and Google Drive.” That duplicate-detection feature, available to users with this Koofr 1TB lifetime plan, allows you to identify unnecessary copies of files so you don’t accidentally waste space. This could prove particularly helpful if you work with disorganized folders. You also can rename multiple files at once and upload and share any file, with no size limits. With Koofr, professionals and students don’t need to risk losing their work when they lose a computer. Likewise, content creators don’t need to overload their devices with video and photo assets and big projects when they can store everything safely in the cloud. Save on a lifetime subscription to Koofr Cloud Storage 1TB Plan You can secure a 1TB Koofr lifetime cloud storage plan for just $119.97 when you enter code KOOFR at checkout. That’s one of the cheapest cloud storage deals you’ll find anywhere. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly We originally published this post Koofr’s 1TB plan, one of the cheapest cloud storage deals available, on March 22, 2024. We updated the pricing info.
html:
• Deals

It’s annoying getting notifications that you’re almost out of storage on your phone or computer. But you can quit playing that ridiculous game with one of the cheapest cloud storage deals around. With this lifetime Koofr plan, you can free up space on your iPhone, Mac or iPad with cloud storage accessible from an unlimited number of devices.

Koofr offers this discounted 1TB cloud storage plan with a lifetime subscription you can’t beat. For a limited time, you can get a lifetime subscription to Koofr cloud storage for just $119.97 with code KOOFR.

Koofr lifetime deal lands you 1TB of secure storage

If you’re trusting your files to the cloud, you need to know the service you’re using has got your back. Koofr does not track your activity, and all your files are encrypted while at rest and in transfer. That means your files are protected when stored, downloaded and uploaded.

Of course, you can still access your files whenever you want, as long as you have an internet connection. Simply log into Koofr from the desktop app or iOS app. (You can also connect external cloud accounts like Dropbox, Google Drive, Amazon and OneDrive to Koofr to access all your files.)

Plus, it’s cheaper than shelling out for iCloud’s monthly fees. It’s one of the cheapest deals on cloud storage currently available.

Advanced features and one of the cheapest cloud storage deals you’ll find

Users give Koofr 4.8 out of 5 stars in the Cult of Mac Deals store. One verified buyer writes, “It’s minimal, the search is fast and features like duplicate detection just don’t exist on Box and Google Drive.”

That duplicate-detection feature, available to users with this Koofr 1TB lifetime plan, allows you to identify unnecessary copies of files so you don’t accidentally waste space. This could prove particularly helpful if you work with disorganized folders. You also can rename multiple files at once and upload and share any file, with no size limits.

With Koofr, professionals and students don’t need to risk losing their work when they lose a computer. Likewise, content creators don’t need to overload their devices with video and photo assets and big projects when they can store everything safely in the cloud.

Save on a lifetime subscription to Koofr Cloud Storage 1TB Plan

You can secure a 1TB Koofr lifetime cloud storage plan for just $119.97 when you enter code KOOFR at checkout. That’s one of the cheapest cloud storage deals you’ll find anywhere.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly We originally published this post Koofr’s 1TB plan, one of the cheapest cloud storage deals available, on March 22, 2024. We updated the pricing info.
